welcomeText: <0>We invite you the 10th anniversary of this famous annual bellydance festival, which will take place on 20-23 of August in the capital city of Poland — Warsaw. Introducing our team of amazing teachers and performers: <1>Diana Gnatchenko, Kazafy, Leandro Ferreyra, Levana, Romina Maluf, Aleksandra Dorofeeva</1> (the winner of 2025 edition), <1>musician Khader Ahmad</1> and, of course, the organizer, the heart and the soul of the festival — <1>Aliah!</1></0>
welcomeText2: <0>We are very happy to announce that the winner of competition in 2026 will get <1>1000€ cash prize</1> as well as the right to be a teacher and a judge at the next edition of Dance Weekend in Warsaw!</0><0>At this edition of the festival your amazing performances on our stage will be captured by our official photographer <1>André Elbing</1>, videographer <1>Vladimir Kluchenkov</1>.</0>
